Description: Basic Qualifications:•   Requires a Bachelor’s degree (or international equivalent) from an accredited university and 4 or more years of relevant experience. If qualifying with a Master’s degree, 3 or more years of relevant professional experience.•   2-3 years of professional experience working on large, industrial, construction projects.•   Commitment to a zero accident safety program.•   Excellent written and oral communication skills, including strong English proficiency.•   Strong team player who is self-motivated and proactive.•   Good computer skills with experience in word processing, spreadsheet, and database applications.Job Details
